alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:17AM CST until February 15 at 11:08AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. For the Tennesse-Tombigbee River ...including Tibbee, Stennis Lock & Dam, Columbus, Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From this morning to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Significant overflow into lowland and cattle grazing land near the Highway 45 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.4 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Noxubee River Macon 26.0 25.9 Sun 8 am CST 29.4 27.2 24.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 830 PM CST.
